title: Pact Boon
content:
our arsenal. Features provide unique abilities that are inherent to a Character's Race, Class, Background selected. These may vary greatly, from allowing you to equip certain Weapons or pieces of Armor with Proficiency, to add your Proficiency Bonus to certain Saving Throws.

Pact Boon Information

Your patron bestows a gift upon you for your loyal service. Choose one of the following pacts:

Pact of the Chain Pact of the Blade Pact of the Tome

How to unlock Pact Boon

Pact Boon can be acquired
